name: 20x24 Montana Freestanding Deck Plan
open_features: 6×6 posts (SP No.2) with Simpson ABU66Z post bases
Beams: (2) 2×12 SP No.2 (Beam 1); (2) 2×12 SP No.2 (Beam 2); (1) 2×12 SP No.2 (Beam 3)
Joists: 2×6 SP No.2 @ 12 in O.C. with Simpson H1A hurricane ties
Stairs: 2×12 stringers @ 12 in O.C.; stair footing 36×24×4 in; Simpson A34/LSC connections
Railing: 4×4 posts @ 4 ft O.C.; 2×4 top/bottom rails; 2×2 pickets @ 5 in O.C. (≤4 in gap)
Decking: 2×6 composite decking; 1/8 in typical gap after drying
